colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B CES @007A *, ,MAndAL GYI DMIGS RIM GSAL BAR STON PA PHAN BDE'I CHAR 'BEBS ZHES BYA BA 'DI NI, DAD STOBS PHUN SUM TSOGS PA SKYID GRONG RDZONG BZHUGS, CHE BA SDE BA TSE DBANG NGAG SPOS 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES BSKUL BA LA BRTEN NAS, BLA MA DAM PA RNAMS KYI ZHABS RDUL SPYI BO'I RGYAN DU 'DZIN PA DGE SLONG YE SHES RGYAN MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O,, ,,'DIS KYANG THUB PA'I BSTAN PA RIN PO CHE 'PHEL ZHING RGYAS PAR GYUR CIG ,DGE'O, ,
